LanguageData.JRWPulmonoscorpiusReconstruct.label: Pulmonoscorpius
LanguageData.JRWPulmonoscorpiusReconstruct.descriptio:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #02881-1994 [PULMONOSCORPIUS KIRKTONENSIS] CODENAME: DEATHSTALKER >310
A large extinct species of scorpion with large claws and a nasty sting. Not something you want to run into in the dead of night.
